name: Big Huge Cellular Automata
description:
3D Cellular Automata that runs in real time.  Hold left click to run the simulation.  Fly with WASD, SPACE, and SHIFT.  Press ESC to close.

Github: https://github.com/billyPersistent/Better-Cellular-Automata

Much better than the first one: https://earlh.itch.io/some-cellular-automata
